Summaries: 8 verses in 1 section. Four historic event are mentioned here and the conclusion is drawn that Allah's judgment will come.

Verses.Text: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ
إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ فَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونٖ

Translations.Text: By the fig and the olive ˹of Jerusalem˺
Indeed, We created humans in the best form
But We will reduce them to the lowest of the low ˹in Hell˺
except those who believe and do good—they will have a never-ending reward
Now, what makes you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment
Is God not the most just of all judges
